title: Leaverbuster (for being constantly bugsplatted loading in)
body:
For some games, I'll get to the loading screen and just bugsplat. I'll try to join again and it gives me either another bugsplat or a connection failed, check your network and try again thing. This has happened so many times, and now I have a 5 game leaverbuster. I dont think I deserve this. 


p.s. I didn't exactly know where to put this post, so I made it here. Thanks for reading.

replies.body: im having the same issue but instead its in the middle of the game
That's unfortunate. I turned on overwolf and tried and I loaded in, but I'm not sure if it fixed the problem.
let me know if it worked :/
I  don't think overwolf worked, but what Broporo suggested did, for me atleast.
ive done all that and made a post and asked for help and never got a reply :/

You may want to take a step back and do some troubleshooting on these bugsplats, I don't want you to get stuck with longer LPQ or worse from something that isn't entirely your fault!

First, run a quick repair through the game client (if you can get that far at least). If you can't get to that option, or it doesn't seem to help at all, try the other steps found in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some other general troubleshooting. If nothing seems to be helping so far, please reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look through your game logs to see what's happening when you crash.
Thanks so much for the help. I'll try that now, I'll get back to you.
